verses.verse: <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>

<S%G3985>for<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3985>being<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G1228>devil.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G5315>ate<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%> <S%G2532>Afterward,<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4931>completed,<s%> he was <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G444><s%> 'Man <S%G2198>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

The <S%G1228>devil,<s%> <S%G321>leading<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G321>up<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3735>a<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4743>moment<s%> of <S%G5550>time.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> their <S%G1391>glory,<s%> for <S%G3754>it<s%> has been <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to <S%G1698>me;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3739>it<s%> to <S%G1437>whomever<s%> I <S%G2309>want.<s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> it will <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4675>yours.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5217>"Get<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G4567>Satan!<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G4352><s%> 'You shall worship the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you shall <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3441>only.<s%>'"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> from <S%G1782>here,<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1781><s%> 'He will put <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> in <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G4675>you,<s%> to <S%G1314>guard<s%> <S%G3754>you;<s%>'

<S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G1909><s%> 'On their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they will <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G142>up,<s%> lest <S%G3379>perhaps<s%> you <S%G4350>dash<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3754>stone.<s%>'"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "It has been <S%G2046>said,<s%> <S%G1598><s%> 'You shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1598>tempt<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3754>God.<s%>'"

<S%G4931>When<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> had <S%G4931>completed<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> he <S%G868>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> another <S%G2540>time.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5345>news<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1831>spread<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the surrounding <S%G4066>area.<s%>
<S%G846>He<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> being <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he had <S%G2258>been<s%> brought <S%G5142>up.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1525>entered,<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G1486>was<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1519>custom,<s%> into the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> to <S%G314>read.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> was <S%G1929>handed<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%> He <S%G380>opened<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%>

"The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1691>me,<s%> <S%G1752>because<s%> he has <S%G5548>anointed<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to preach good <S%G2097>news<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%> He has <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G2390>heal<s%> the <S%G2588>brokenhearted,<s%> to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> <S%G859>release<s%> to the <S%G164>captives,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> recovering of <S%G309>sight<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G649><s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G859>deliver<s%> those who are <S%G3739>crushed,<s%>
and to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> the <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4428>closed<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> <S%G591>gave<s%> it <S%G591>back<s%> to the <S%G5257>attendant,<s%> and sat <S%G2523>down.<s%> <S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G816>fastened<s%> on <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4594>"Today,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> has <S%G4137>been<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3775>hearing.<s%>"

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3140>testified<s%> <S%G3140>about<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3056>the<s%> <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3756>"Isn't<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>'s <S%G5207>son?<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3843>"Doubtless<s%> you <S%G2046>will<s%> <S%G2046>tell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable,<s%> <S%G2395><s%> 'Physician, <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G4572>yourself!<s%> <S%G3745>Whatever<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3968>hometown.<s%>'"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> "Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3968>hometown.<s%>

<S%G1161%G99999>But<s%> <S%G225>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> was shut <S%G2808>up<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G1909>a<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>land.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> <S%G3992>was<s%> <S%G1487>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4558>Zarephath,<s%> in the land of <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who was a <S%G5503>widow.<s%>

<S%G2532>There<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3015>lepers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> in the <S%G1909>time<s%> of <S%G1666>Elisha<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G3762>not<s%> one of <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G1487>cleansed,<s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G3497>Naaman,<s%> the <S%G4948>Syrian.<s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>They<s%> were all <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G2372>wrath<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> as they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> rose <S%G450>up,<s%> <S%G1544>threw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G3790>brow<s%> of the <S%G3735>hill<s%> that <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G3618>built<s%> <S%G1909>on,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> they might <S%G2630>throw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> off the <S%G3739>cliff.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G846>he,<s%> <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3319>midst,<s%> went his <S%G4198>way.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> came <S%G2718>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the Sabbath <S%G4521>day,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority.<s%>

<S%G1722>In<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G1140>demon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he cried <S%G349>out<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Ah!<s%> what have we to <S%G2254>do<s%> with <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth?<s%> Have you <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2248>us?<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> you <S%G1488>are:<s%> the Holy <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Be <S%G5392>silent,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%>" <S%G2532>When<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> had <S%G4496>thrown<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> down <S%G1519>in<s%> their <S%G3319>midst,<s%> he <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> having done <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G984>harm.<s%>

<S%G2285>Amazement<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4814>spoke<s%> <S%G4314>together,<s%> one with <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>word?<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> he <S%G2004>commands<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they come <S%G1831>out!<s%>"
<S%G2279>News<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> went <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> of the surrounding <S%G4066>region.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G450>rose<s%> <S%G450>up<s%> from the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>'s <S%G3614>house.<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>'s <S%G3994>mother-in<s%>-law <S%G2258>was<s%> afflicted <S%G4912>with<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4446>fever,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2065>begged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2186>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G4446>fever;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%> <S%G3916>Immediately<s%> she <S%G450>rose<s%> up and <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
